resources.string: Press \'Start\' to begin setting up your workout:
This workout is empty. New exercises will be added soon.

Begin by pressing Start on the Home page.

On each of the pages that follow, provide the app with information by selecting the options that apply to you and pressing Next.

After choosing your options you will be prompted to press Generate Workout. Upon selection, your workout will be displayed.

Press Shuffle Workout to get new exercises or Save Workout to use it again another time. Saved workouts can be accessed from the Home page by pressing Saved Workouts.

(NOTE: When selecting a fitness level, we recommend choosing Beginner if you have been training for less than a year, Intermediate for –3 years and Advanced for more than 3 years of training.)

EasyFit Workout Generator is a smartphone application which generates unique exercise programmes, or workouts, which are specifically tailored to the needs of the user. The exercises for each workout are selected based on a combination of inputs from the user and random selection from a backend database.

Information is collected from the user in four input stages:

Fitness Level – the difficulty level of the workout. Users with a higher level of fitness will get a longer, more challenging workout. 

Fitness Goal – the type of training the user would like to undertake. Selecting strength will give exercises with lower repetition ranges per set, which should be performed with heavier weight. Choosing size will be give a medium repetition range for each exercise and conditioning will give a high range.

Muscle Groups – which muscle groups will be targeted during the workout.

Equipment – the equipment available for the workout.
When the workout is generated, the result will be a list of exercises that meet these criteria. Each exercise will include the number of sets and reps to perform and a link to an online guide with information on how to perform the exercise. An option is available to save the workout for later use.
